actionTemplate.title: Distant Mountain Brow
steps: Keep the brow light overall; elongate but blur the outline
Use powder to sketch the shapeâ€”avoid hard edges
Create a soft matte gradient from front to tail
Blend repeatedly for a hazy, distant-mountain feel
Add only a few hair strokes if needed

rationaleTemplate: A soft, light brow reads classic and gentle.
Ideal for low-contrast or historical-style makeup.
